title: Desperate in DC
description: Desperate in DC is the hilarious blog-book creation of Crystal Walker and Phoebe Thompson, two Washington, D.C. moms wrestling in very different ways with the issues of motherhood, money and marriage. The authors gleefully skewer the privileged and powerful in the nation's capital, while simultaneously tackling their own life challenges. Grab yourself a cocktail and prepare for some scandalous fun!
author: Phoebe Thompson
